ai.summary: Crowan FP 57 Ground truth is a very short, easy hike in the UK, about 0.5 km. It’s ideal for beginners, families, and a quick outdoor stroll. The route is straightforward with minimal elevation and clear wayfinding.
ai.terrain_summary: Flat, well-marked path with a smooth surface and gentle grades. Minimal technical terrain, suitable for most walkers including those with strollers on accessible segments where permitted.
ai.safety_notes: Check the weather forecast before you go. Wear sturdy, comfortable footwear. Stay on the designated path and respect any livestock or wildlife. Bring water, a charged phone, and a light layer; use reflective gear if walking at dusk or in low visibility conditions.
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn are ideal; the hike is achievable year-round in mild weather.
